SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO" , workGrpCd AS "WORKGRPCD" , intfId AS "INTFID" , intfName AS "INTFNAME" , BjobDmndMsgID AS "BJOBDMNDMSGID" , errGubun AS "ERRGUBUN" , sndRcvKind AS "SNDRCVKIND" , errRegDate AS "ERRREGDATE" , systemKind AS "SYSTEMKIND" , adptrCd AS "ADPTRCD" , adptrCdSeq AS "ADPTRCDSEQ" , errMsg AS "ERRMSG" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.errRegDate DESC, A.intfId) ROWNO, B.workGrpCd, A.intfId, B.intfName, A.BjobDmndMsgID, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.BjobDmndMsgID, 1, LENGTH(A.intfId)) = A.intfId THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS errGubun, A.sndRcvKind, A.errRegDate, A.systemKind, A.adptrCd, A.adptrCdSeq, A.errMsg AS errMsg FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES05 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 B WHERE A.intfId=B.intfId AND A.errRegDate BETWEEN #searchStartTime# AND #searchEndTime# AND B.workGrpCd IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
B.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.sndRcvKind = #searchSndRcvKind#
A.SystemKind = #searchSystemKind#
A.errMsg LIKE #searchErrMsg#
ORDER BY ROWNO ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(A.intfId) AS "TOTALCOUNT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES05 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 B WHERE A.IntfId=B.IntfId AND A.errRegDate BETWEEN #searchStartTime# AND #searchEndTime# AND B.workGrpCd IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
B.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.sndRcvKind = #searchSndRcvKind#
A.SystemKind = #searchSystemKind#
A.errMsg LIKE #searchErrMsg#
